title: Allow bookmarklets
body: Internet Explorer, along with every other desktop browser, used to support bookmarklets. These lightweight, easy-to-develop scripts can run on any page and provide valuable functionality to users.

comments.body: You can use a free 3rd party application called EdgeManage that will allow you to edit the URLs in a favorite so that it supports bookmarklets
Users should be able to drag a bookmarklet to their favorites bar to install it. They should be able to right-click one and add it as a bookmark. And they should be able to edit their bookmarks.
